mapper.select: select p.id,p.ClntMrk,p.AppCde appCdePlay, p.AppNme appNmePlay, p.CertfCls certfClsPlay, p.CertfCde certfCdePlay, p.ClntAddr clntAddrPlay, p.Email emailPlay, p.Mobile mobilePlay, p.Country countryPlay, p.ZipCde, p.CusRiskLvl, p.CustRiskRank from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and AppNme like CONCAT('%','${appNmePlay}','%' ) and AppCde=#{AppCde} and ClntAddr like CONCAT('%','${clntAddrPlay}','%' ) and CertfCde=#{CertfCde} and createAccount =#{createAccount} group by AppCde limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from (select id from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and AppNme like CONCAT('%','${appNmePlay}','%' ) and AppCde=#{AppCde} and ClntAddr like CONCAT('%','${clntAddrPlay}','%' ) and CertfCde=#{certfCdePlay} and createAccount =#{createAccount} group by AppCde) a

select p.id, p.AppNme appNmePlay, p.CertfCls certfClsPlay, p.CertfCde certfCdePlay, p.ClntAddr clntAddrPlay, p.Email emailPlay, p.Mobile mobilePlay, p.Country countryPlay from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update nvhlapplicantvo set updatetime=now(),updateAccount=#{updateAccount} ,AppNme=#{AppNme} ,CertfCls=#{CertfCls} ,CertfCde=#{CertfCde} ,ClntAddr=#{ClntAddr} ,Email=#{Email} ,Mobile=#{Mobile} ,Country=#{Country} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from nvhlapplicantvo where 1=1 and AppCde=#{AppCde}
mapper.delete: delete from NvhlApplicantVO where AppCde=#{AppCde} and AppNme=#{AppNme} and createAccount =#{createAccount}
